dcterms:description: An interaction dataset acquired using the Microsoft Kinect sensor, containing 282 moving skeleton sequences performed by two interacting individuals, belonging to 8 action categories.
dcterms:title: SBU Interaction

dcterms:creator: G. Garcia-Hernando
S. Yuan
S. Baek
T.-K. Kim
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1175 skeletons belonging to 45 action categories performed by 6 different individuals in 3 scenarios, with each skeleton including 21 hand joints.
dcterms:title: First-Person Hand Action (FPHA)
